name: Hammering: Block Puzzle
description:
Simple and strategic puzzle game "Hammering: Block Puzzle!"

Use a hammer block to drive a nail in.
Game over when the nail comes down to the bottom.
How many points can you score?

How to play
◆Place a hammer block!
◆Make a bingo with a nail!
◆Earn combo score!
◆Challenge your best score!

Top-Rated Gameplay
◆Success in 4-line bingo at once!
◆7 consecutive combo!
◆Become the number one in the rank!
